name: Arturo Fuente - OpusX - Lost City - Robusto
additionalNotes:
One of the most sought after, and hardest to find cigars in the world, the Opus X cigars are the pinnacle of perfection when it comes to ultra-premium cigars. Carlos and companyâ€™s latest creation, the Fuente Fuente Opus X The Lost City. Made in ultra-small batches, these Opus X Lost City cigars incorporate 
Medium bodied in strength, complex notes of earth, spice, cedar and pepper meld beautifully with the delectable essence of cream and caramel to create a smoke worthy of its legendary name.
